actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a flood control project for flood control and related purposes on Hatcher Bayou and Durden Creek, Warren County, Miss.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a flood control project on Hatcher Bayou and Durden Creek, Mississippi.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a flood control project for flood control and related purposes on Hatcher Bayou and Durden Creek, Warren County, Miss.
